conclusion: The problem asks if the particle undergoes linear motion with gradually decreasing acceleration from 1 to 2 seconds.
The acceleration is not gradually decreasing; it is gradually becoming more negative.
The v-t graph shows velocity starting at 20 m/s at t = 1 s and decreasing to 10 m/s at t = 2 s.
The acceleration starts at 0 m/s² at t = 1 s and becomes increasingly negative until t ≈ 2 s.
The correct description is that from 1 s to 2 s the particle moves in a straight line with an acceleration whose value changes smoothly from 0 to some negative value.
